My internet works fine though and after restarting my pc I still can't reconnect. Please help.

Hello there Porocles,

Was trying again this patch to play in fullscreen (since I wouldn't need to alt+tab to the client and back to lock the mouse in the application).

Due to these tests I have a question on Fullscreen/Borderless and my fan throttling until I alt+tab to the client and back again.

Here are the steps:

Version 1:
Step 1. Go in-game while on borderless---> switch to fullscreen.
Step 2. Fan will start--->switch to borderless fan slows and stops within 10 seconds.

Version 2:
Step 1. Go in-game while on borderless---> switch to fullscreen.
Step 2. Fan will start--->alt+tab to client and back again--> fan slows and stops within 3 seconds.

These are consistently reproducable on my end.

I am running the game on native resolution (1600x900) on fullscreen but usually run on borderless 1280x720.

Hey LostFr0st!  Is there any possibility of a background application like overlays or recorders that might be contributing while on fullscreen?  It's a strange case but that would be the first step I'd recommend, if you'd like to give [clean boot](https://support.gaijin.net/hc/en-us/articles/200070041-How-To-Perform-a-Clean-Boot-PC-MAC-) a go.

Tried the boot last time (I guess I can always try it again) and there is absolutely nothing else running but the client and the game.

I've gone through the support FPS and other guides already (they helped) so the only thing I'm missing out on now is fullscreen without turbo fan happening.

I know it's really strange Porocles, that's why I've been avoiding it by playing on borderless^^"

I asked our tech guys about this and because it's a strange case it may be better to put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  That will help get a better idea of your setup via [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) logs and look for the culprit.
Ok, will do.  Thanks for the help Porocles.  Have a great afternoon.

Hey There Porocles,

I tried playing league today but it gave me this message "The version of this file is not compatible with the version of windows you're running check your computer's system info to see where you need a 32-bit version or a 64- bit version" But this has never happened before, can you tell me what to do?
I've been getting ping ponging between 300 and 900 ping for this patch(used to a steady 100-110) any ideas on causes?

Hmmm those kinds of spikes make me think you might be having some packet loss or an otherwise unstable connection going on. 

Run a trace route for about 5-10 min to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and shoot those results over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to check for any packet loss and what to do afterward (I don't want your public info being out here in the open!!).
A few players I know have been having ping spikes since the preseason update so this is an issue that quite a few people are having specifically with LoL.
Same. Every since the new Patch my ping won't stay down. If it is something with Riot. I hope they fix it
TY and submitted.
